title:          "Free Stuff! - Seeed Studio Grove  Modules"
date:           2012-06-18T10:26:38.000Z
author:         Amit Naran
tags:           Seeedstudio
originalUrl:    https://developer.mbed.org/blog/entry/Free-Stuff---Seeedstudio-Modules/
---

<p>
  <a href="http://www.seeedstudio.com" rel="nofollow">Seeed
  Studio</a>, one of our mbed distributors has kindly sent us some
  Grove Modules to give-away to mbed users, in return for writing a
  library and cookbook page for them.
</p>
<p>
  <br>
</p>
<p>
  <img width="350" alt="Seeed" title="Seeed" src=
  "data:image/jpeg;base64,">
</p>
<p>
  <img width="350" alt="Grove" title="Grove" src=
  "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/350xNx_scaled_grovemodules.jpg.pagespeed.ic.X5GVd_QTPc.jpg">
</p>
<p>
  <br>
</p>
<p>
  If you want one of the modules, then send an email to <a href=
  "mailto:contact@mbed.org">contact@mbed.org</a> with 'Seeed
  Studio' in the subject line telling us which module you would
  like, and we can get one out to you.
</p>
<p>
  The modules we have are -
</p>
<table>
  <tr>
    <td>
      <img width="200" alt="Accelerometer" title="Accelerometer"
      src=
      "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/200xNx_scaled_accelerometer.jpg.pagespeed.ic.5-clfFe_QT.jpg"><br>

      <a href=
      "http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/grove-3axis-accelerometer-p-765.html?cPath=144_146"
      rel="nofollow">Grove - 3-axis Accelerometer</a> -
      <strong>Gone!</strong>
    </td>
    <td>
      <img width="200" alt="RTC" title="RTC" src=
      "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/200xNx_scaled_rtc.jpg.pagespeed.ic.kF42oZZyaj.jpg"><br>

      <a href=
      "http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/grove-rtc-p-758.html?cPath=144_152"
      rel="nofollow">Real Time Clock</a> - <strong>Gone!</strong>
    </td>
    <td>
      <img width="200" alt="OLED" title="OLED" src=
      "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/200xNx_scaled_oled.jpg.pagespeed.ic.HM2qmN45UT.jpg"><br>

      <a href=
      "http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/grove-oled-display-12864-p-781.html?cPath=163_167"
      rel="nofollow">OLED Display</a> - <strong>Gone!</strong>
    </td>
    <td>
      <img width="200" alt="Temp &amp; Humidity Sensor" title=
      "Temp &amp; Humidity Sensor" src=
      "https://developer.mbed.org/media/uploads/anaran/200xNx_scaled_temp_humid.jpg.pagespeed.ic.X-EfdyJ2Yo.jpg"><br>

      <a href=
      "http://www.seeedstudio.com/depot/grove-temphumi-sensor-p-745.html?cPath=144_147"
      rel="nofollow">Temp and Humidity Sensor</a> -
      <strong>Gone!</strong>
    </td>
    <td>
      <img height="150" width="200" alt="Ultrasonic" src=

      <a href=

      rel="nofollow">Ultrasonic Ranger</a> - <strong>Gone!</strong>
    </td>
  </tr>
</table>
<p>
  There is only one of each modules, so first in first served!<br>
  <br>
</p>
<h2>
  EDIT: Modules are all gone now!
</h2>
<p>
  Thanks to all of that replied. For those of you that were
  successful - enjoy the modules, and we look forward to your
  notebook pages.
</p>
<p>
  If you are interested in future giveaways, <a href=
  "http://mbed.us2.list-manage.com/subscribe?u=3f0810949c1726aa0dd2d19e2&amp;id=d6d605a287&amp;SRC=General%20Interest"
  rel="nofollow">join the mbed mailing list</a>
</p>
